title: Silicon Mix Hair Treatment 8oz
description: Silicon Mix Hair Treatment restores the health, shine and the softness of dry, damaged and weak hair. (8 oz)

title: Redken Extreme Cat Protein Reconstructing Treatment Spray, 5 Ounce
description: This spray delivers protein and ceramide to help fortify weakened areas,. Protect internal strength and reinforce surface protection and shine. For distressed hair. Made in usa.

title: Redken Smooth Down Butter Treatment 8.5 oz
description: Smooth Down Butter Treat smoothing treatment is a rich, luscious cream that provides intensive, deep smoothing to very dry/unruly hair. Redken's exclusive Interbond Conditioning System delivers a unique Ionic Smoothing Complex of macadamia oil, candelilla wax, and cationic refiners for super long-lasting conditioning, nourishment and a smooth, frizz-free finish. Hair is treated, streamlined, manageable and shiny.

title: Alter Ego Maschera Ristrutturante Al Cocco Coconut Conditioning Mask - 33.8 oz / liter
description: Nourishing, moisturizing and conditioning mask. Non-grease, does not leave your hair heavy. It provides a silky and soft look. Ideal for dry and treat hair. Directions: Wash hair Biostyling, moisturizing bath. Towel-dry hair, apply mask to scalp evenly, then to hair shaft and ends. Leave on few minutes. Rinse well.

title: Crecepelo Tratamiento Fitoterapeutico Natural(Phitoterapeutic Treatment) 16oz
description: NATURAL PHITOTERAPEUTIC TREATMENT FOR CAPILLAR GROWTH First Treatment phito therapeutic that consists on the use of Natural plants, for the capillary growth. It innovative formula contributes extracts and active 100% natural necessary for a good hair condition, avoiding the excessive one Desquamation adding the nutrients to return, health, beauty, vitality, softness and flexibility to the hair, helping to growth.

title: Alter Ego Energizing and Rebalancing Cream - 33.8 oz / liter
description:
Product Description
Directions: For a more intensive effect, apply the hair treatment from the scalp to the ends of the hair and massage gently. Leave for about 15 min. and then rinse. For a no-rinse treatment after appling the comditioner on the hair comb and then proceed with the hair-style. Size : 1000ml
